How can I keep from getting a cold or the flu?
responses: preventions that you must follow :Wash your hands,Avoid touching your face,Clean frequently used surfaces,Use hand sanitizers

patterns: tell me some prevention method from fever

responses: medicines you can consume : Insulin ,Amylinomimetic drug,Dipeptidyl peptidase-4 (DPP-4) inhibitor

patterns: tell me some prevention method from diabetes

responses: prevention that you must follow :Cut Sugar and Refined Carbs From Your Diet,Work Out Regularly,Drink Water as Your Primary Beverage,Lose Weight If You’re Overweight or Obese,Quit Smoking, Follow a Very-Low-Carb Diet,Watch Portion Sizes
